items.title: How to become a web hosting reseller and get new clients
items.headline: Learn how to become a web hosting reseller, migrate a website, skyrocket your income, and get new clients, the easy way.
objectives_summary: How to start a hosting reseller business by watching every step of the way in real time.
How to seamlessly migrate a Wordpress website from one hosting account to another.
All about the IT components; domains, hosting, DNS settings, and nameservers.

items.title: Digital Portrait Drawing for Beginners and Advanced Students
items.headline: Learn digital drawing step by step – Portraits & Photoshop tricks
objectives_summary: digital drawing & painting
digital portrait drawing in Photoshop
realistic drawing

items.title: How to create amazing 3D arts with Artcam
items.headline: Become a professional 3D CNC designer
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to create and modify 3D model in Artcam ready to cut in CNC
You'll able to import and prepare your 3D models for CNC machining

items.title: Complex Systems Design: An Introduction
items.headline: Building complex systems for the 21st centurey
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you should have a basic grasp of complexity theory, a solid grasp of what complex engineered systems are and the basic principals, architecture and methods used to approach the design of complex systems within a wide variety of areas

items.title: ANSYS CFD for Turbulent Aerodynamics Flows
items.headline: You will learn about the aerodynamic flows CFD using Ansys  ICEMCFD and Ansys Fluent
objectives_summary: You will be able to create airfoil data file from coordinates for ICEMCFD
You will be to create high quality hexa mesh with boundary layer and Y+ considerations
How to create three meshes for mesh-independence study

items.title: Total Station, Surveying  and Mapping

visible_instructors.name: Sanath
visible_instructors.job_title: Associate Professor at Nagarjuna College of Engineering and Technology
visible_instructors.title: Sanath Kumar K. R.

items.headline: Civil Engineering
objectives_summary: Total Station Surveying and Data handling

items.title: Street Lighting design using DIALux 4.13
items.headline: The first step to mastering street lighting
objectives_summary: You will learn how to design any street lighting, from sscratch, using DIALux 4
You will also learn what are the different classifications of roads, and how to select the class
You will also learn what each factor means, and how they are related to the design

items.title: Comic Book Character Design: The Making of E
items.headline: Learn to Draw, Ink and Color Comic Book Characters
objectives_summary: How to establish the proportions, pose and placement of your characters with the mannequin model.
How to draw the underlying anatomy of your character so that you can accurately define the shape of their body and fit the costuming around it.
How to present the same character consistently from multiple angles.

items.title: How to use Fiverr to Sustain a Freelance Career
items.headline: Learn how to build a business online as a freelancer on Fiverr.  Step-by-step training to get you started.
objectives_summary: Earn money on Fiverr by following the simple step by step videos in this course.
Finally breakthrough to earning money online by using Fiverr's website.
Understand what hot selling gigs you should set up for your Fiverr business!

items.title: Build a Lightsaber: Luke ANH Edition from Star Wars
items.headline: Gather the parts and learn to build a seriously epic vintage lightsaber prop from Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope.
objectives_summary: Build Luke Skywalker's lightsaber from Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

items.title: Easy Cartoon Backgrounds for Animation
items.headline: Learn everything you need to create cartoon backgrounds like the ones you see on TV, using Inkscape.
objectives_summary: Draw cartoon backgrounds for animation.
Learn vector illustration techniques.
How to use Inkscape for illustrations.

items.title: How to draw hairy creatures in Photoshop...
items.headline: (Using  Photoshop Spatter Brushes)
objectives_summary: These exercises will condition the student to be able to work faster on deadlines and with repetition help them to remember tools, and short cuts for faster deadline delivery.

items.title: Design of Solar PV Systems
items.headline: Course let you easily understand solar PV systems and properly design them considering performance issues.
objectives_summary: PV System Components
Solar Radiation Data Sources
Performance of PV Panels

items.title: Make Realistic Floral Necklaces Using Polymer Clay

visible_instructors.name: Maha
visible_instructors.job_title: Polymer Clay Artist - Founder at Selsal
visible_instructors.title: Maha Atef

items.headline: Learn the "Applique Technique" in polymer clay to make jewelry with flowers
objectives_summary: You'll be able to make necklaces and pendants with detailed and realistic flowers; what is called the "applique technique" in polymer clay.
If you're a beginner, you'll gain the basic knowledge about polymer clay first.
Course content includes but not limited to; general properties about polymer clay, conditioning the clay, baking it, storage and safety issues.

items.title: Penmanship Fundamentals: Learn Cursive and Calligraphy
items.headline: Learn Cursive and Calligraphy: Two courses in one!
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of Cursive writing and Calligraphy
Learn how to write different letters, lowercase and uppercase letters
Learn how to read cursive and write faster using Cursive writing

items.title: Event Management in 3D Virtual Worlds (2021 Edition)

items.headline: MBA in Artificial Intelligence Digital Marketing: Term 3.4 course that focusses on creating events in 3D Virtual Worlds
objectives_summary: Be able to understand and navigate through virtual 3D worlds in 2021
Know about virtual 3D world meetings that happen frequently in Altspace VR
Be able to use AltspaceVR and other 3d portals to create 3D immersive events.
